request: Optimize performance and security for the curriculum management system with comprehensive testing

consolidated_recommendations.recommendation: Enable Django's cached template loader in production
Use Django Debug Toolbar to identify slow queries
Implement database query optimization with select_related()
Add appropriate database indexes on foreign keys and filter fields
Setup: Create test database backup, Set up test fixtures, Clear test cache
Integration Testing: Test module interactions, Verify data flow, Check API contracts, Test database operations
Validation: Run full test suite, Generate coverage report, Check for regressions, Document results
Always use Django's ORM to prevent SQL injection
Enable CSRF protection on all forms

action_items.command: git add -A && git commit -m 'CHECKPOINT: Before agent-recommended changes'
coverage run --source='.' manage.py test && coverage report
